textBeforeTable: Payment details Returns are accepted if the buyer is not satisfied with the product and the product is returned UNOPENED and damage free. Return postage is the responsibility of the buyer except in cases of damaged goods or errors on our part. We must be made aware of your desire to return the item prior to your returning it so that we may correctly track the transaction and ensure proper handling of merchandise or refunds. Return policy details The buyer is responsible for return shipping costs. Money back or item exchange (buyer's choice) 14 days after the buyer receives it Refund will be given as Item must be returned within Return policy
textAfterTable: Seller's payment instructions PayPal, VISA/MC, AMEX, Discover. US shipping via USPS Priority Mail; Intl shipping via USPS First Class Package International Service or Priority International Mail. The USPS offers NO tracking or insurance for First Class Package International Service. For tracking and insurance, you MUST pay the Priority International rate. We combine multiple purchases to minimize shipping costs. Credit card payments may be telephoned to 1-815-963-0200. time left Current bid amount + Shipping amount Bid Count time left
